title: Set up in-person payments
content:
FeedbackHomeOnlineIn-PersonMultiparty3rd PartyPayoutsDisputesReportsIdentityDocs ArchiveVideoIn-PersonPoint-of-Sale (Zettle)Payment SDK (Zettle)Enterprise OmnichannelIn-Person/ In-Person OpenAI iconAsk ChatGPT   Set up in-person paymentsDOCSCURRENTLast updated: Feb 27th, 7:51am Looking for only a QR code solution? Allow customers to pay with scannable QR codes. Find out more.Point of Sale (Zettle)

Secure checkout for all payment methods
No lock-in contracts, no hidden fees
Bank deposits in 1-2 working days

Find out morePayment SDK (Zettle)

Take card payments and issue refunds from within your own service with ease
Integrate into your iOS and Android app for 13 markets
Include card payments and payments with digital wallets, like Apple Pay, Google Pay and Samsung Pay
Accept PayPal and Venmo QR code payments

Get startedBraintree In-Person

Built for large enterprises and custom solutions
Support for omnichannel use cases, including in-store and e-commerce
Flexible API integration helps making updates and enhancements easy to access without additional operational burden
